Html:
I need to create excel file with images.

OpenXML - 2 Mb, but with bugs by opening (successfully repaired by Excel 2007 and can not open by Excel 2007 Viewer )
removedPart: /xl/sharedStrings.xml-Part with XML-Error.  (Zeichenfolgen) Invalid xml-symbol. Zeile 67, Spalte 12
removedRecord: Cell information of /xl/worksheets/sheet1.xml-Part
removedRecord: Cell information of /xl/worksheets/sheet2.xml-Part

Excel 5 - Too much time und too much memory (>1Gb) -  unsuccessfully.
I know, that Excel 5 is deprecated.

PS. Is PHPExcel the only PHP library to genarate XLS files?
Our customers use Excel 2000-2003 but not Excel 2007.

PHPExcel SVN Version 10.06.08

There's also PEAR Spreadsheet Excel, which is actually used within PHPExcel to provide XLS support.

Regarding the "invalid xml symbol": I assume you have German characters in your text, make sure they are encoded using utf8_encode or iconv.

>There's also PEAR Spreadsheet Excel, which is actually used within PHPExcel to provide XLS support.

OK. But PEAR Spreadsheet Excel has the same problem with images as PHPExcel (based on PEAR Spreadsheet Excel) . Is not it?

And the only possibility to generate Excel reports with many images is PHPExcel (Excel 2007 format)?

>make sure they are encoded using utf8_encode or iconv.
OK. Solved.

PS. Is there plans for OpenDocument support?

May be JPEG pictures has internal supoort by Excel2007?

We have to convert into BMP for Excel5?
